name: Throwing Knife
description:
Bats everywhere and only one knife. Defend yourself from the bat hordes attacking from both sides. 

You are a master of the knife and so must show off when passing your knife to your other hand by throwing it over your head. Just don't lose your knife or your head in the process.

Controls:

Left MB - Left Hand

Right MB - Right Hand

R - Restart

Pretty simple. 

Ideal for anyone that hates bats.
